action: List all configuration variables already set up
Configures the user's email address
Configures the user's name
Confirms all changes of previously added files
Shows the changes made in the current staging
Shows the changes made to the commit <commit_id_to> from the commit <commit_id_from>
Loads the commit <commit_id> changes made in [file_name]
Removes <file_name> from the hard drive
Removes <file_name> from the staging area and the repository
Removes <file_name> from the hard drive, the staging area and the repository
Loads the commit <commit_id> keeping the last changes in the staging area
Loads the commit <commit_id> discarding all changes in the staging area and the forward commits in the repository
Removes the whole changes in [file_name] from the staging area
Links the local repo with a remote one located in <repo-URL> and set its reference as <ref-name>
Merges history from the branch <branch-name> of <ref-name> repo and optionally allows fetching though the remote history doesn't match the local counterpart and disable the rebase flag
Replaces the current <ref-name> repo URL with which is specified by <repo-URL>
Shows the whole project history
Show the whole project history branches graph
Shows the whole project history branches graph in color
Shows the whole project history branches compact graph in color
Adds a tag to a commit identified by its hashcode
Shows the current tags
Shows the commits hashcode with its associated tag
Merges the local branch tags with the <branch-name> tags of the repo <ref-name>
Deletes the tag <tag> from the local repo
Updates the reference to the tag <tag> in the remote repo <ref-name>
Shows all branches history
Pushes the local branch <local-branch> to the remote repo <ref-name>
Downloads a copy fo the project stored in the <repo-URL>

Overrites the project history of current auxiliary branch merging the history of the branch <branch-name> as if all commits from the current auxiliary branch were made after the commits from the branch <branch-name>.
Warning! You must first check out to the auxiliary branch you're willing to rebase with the main branch history and then rebase the main branch history with the auxiliary branch.
Saves draft changes made in the current branch without performing a commit
Lists all stashes in the current branch
Retrieves the stashed changes
Retrieves the stashed changes into the branch <branch-name>
Deletes the stashed changes
Simulates the cleaning process to explore which files are going to be deleted from the repo
Deletes untracked files from the repo
Retrieves the commit <commit-hash> into the current branch
Shows the whole project history even the deleted branchs or reset commits
